body.name: Selfie Stick Tripod, 40 in Retractable Phone Tripod with Wireless Remote Control & Light, Portable Selfie Stick Tripod for Photograph, Live Streaming, Video Recording, Compatible with All Cellphones
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 12 mins
features: [Tumbler that can be carried around]--The selfie stick adopts a hidden retractable design, which is very light and small when folded, so it is convenient to carry around. Pull out the pole to extend a certain distance, from 7.5 inches to 40 inches, providing you with different field of view shooting effects. It's not just a selfie stick, it also converts into a phone stand. The handle pulls away from the bottom to create a tripod that you can place on flat ground for extra stability.

[Record your every moment in all directions]--This tripod selfie stick is made of aluminum alloy, which is sturdy and durable. The mobile phone holder adopts a 360° rota-table mobile phone clip and a 225° rota-table gimbals to help you quickly find the best shooting angle. When using it, just pull the support point and extend the spring end of the clip to fix your phone. There is also a switch on the side of the bracket to adjust the tension, which is fully prepared for your shooting.

[Wireless Remote Control Brings Infinite Convenience]--The selfie stick tripod with remote is very easy to use. When shooting, just press the button on the handle to take pictures easily. And this remote control is detachable Bluetooth, suitable for iOS and Android cellphones, the Bluetooth control distance can reach up to 33 feet, allowing you to take pictures by yourself or in groups by taking off the remote control.

[Two light senses illuminate your beauty]--The small white screen on the end of the selfie stick phone holder is the fill light. It has two modes, one is natural fill light, the other is intensity fill light, you can adjust it by pressing the dot button on the back according to your needs. Whether it is day or night, the selfie stick with light can give you the best natural beauty.

[Freeze your beautiful memories]--Portable selfie stick is a great addition to your life. You can record any moment you want to take pictures during class reunions, family reunions, travel, graduation ceremonies, etc. You can also record videos, shoot adventure records, and start live broadcasts, etc. At the same time, it is also the best gift for friends, colleagues, sisters, and classmates on birthdays, Valentine's Day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple to use right out of the package
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. What's not to like when a product like it is supposed to work. The price was only five bucks it's hard to beat something like this. it's not real heavy duty but I think it will work for what most people want. I'm going to do some family photos and maybe a little outdoor work and I actually bought a second one for my children. When a price on something is reduced you become a little suspicious. And it might be that it is a fairly lightweight item but if you're carrying it in a backpack and you want something that will extend about five feet up and stand on its own tripod it's just right. Everything worked is it I hoped it would. The Bluetooth Link initially said I needed an app but I did not. After a couple of minutest it linked. the video worked great and snapshots were very good. I set it about 30 ft from me and it still took a video and good photos. so the distance wasn't a problem. it might even go further than that. I'll find out when I go outside

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the best selfie stick I have seen. I love that it is so versatile. It includes a light, has its own. Tripod and it includes a remote. Easily connects to your phone with Bluetooth

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: It’s decent for the price, everything functioned properly however the tripod was a huge let down, which is the main reason I purchased it. The tripod is uneven and won’t stand up. But for 6 bucks I can’t really complain, just know that before you buy it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars looks and felt sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Had to return. Couldn't get it to work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love it so much! It’s perfect and exactly what I needed! Easy to use, pretty sturdy and the light is surprisingly bright! I would recommend it 100%

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars sturdiness is weak
reviews.reviewText: Phones with a case on it doesn't work as good. It doesn't clip in tight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Remote easily lost
reviews.reviewText: The selfie stick worked well to take pictures while on vacation with a friend - finally able to take pictures together while on our own. My only complaint is that the remote control is not connected to the selfie stick so unfortunately it fell out of its slider and got lost. So it was only good for part of one trip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I’m just gonna start this review with disclosing that I bought this tripod for when I’m doing unholy things that my grandpa wouldn’t approve of and recording them to share with other people like my mom taught me not to do.Now that that’s out of the way.The pros:- it’s cheap!- the button works.- the light is bright.- the light is rechargeable.- it’s strong enough to hold my phone with a case on it (which has been a struggle with phone mounts in the past).- it’s strong enough that I can put the bottom inch of my phone in the clamp and it doesn’t tip or fall.- it’s LONG.Cons:- i wish the remote snapped into the handle or something. I already know it’s gonna get lost if I take it somewhere lol- I didn’t take points off for this but I wish the legs of the tripod were longer. *it’s my own fault because I had it sitting on the squishy couch but* it it’s not sturdy on soft surfaces and ends up falling over.- I didn’t take points off for this either but I wish the light had more settings than just bright & brighter. Some lights have the warm/cool light options which would be nice.- it’s HARD to get it to telescope. I’m scared I’m gonna break it. It’s also really difficult to rotate the pole.- idk how long the battery on the remote works?Overall, I would recommend this. It seems like a great product for its value.
